skill.name: Document Writing Coordination
skill.description: This skill should be used when the user asks to "coordinate document writing", "manage doc writers", "create a design document with multiple writers", "orchestrate documentation", "delegate doc sections", "cos for documentation", "chief of staff for docs", or needs to break a large document into sections and delegate writing to multiple agents via VibeKanban.
skill.summary: This skill should be used when the user asks to "coordinate document writing", "manage doc writers",...
skill.author: ClementWalter

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing only markdown guides and templates. No executable code, scripts, network operations, or file system access. All code blocks are examples of MCP tool usage patterns, not actual running code.

content.value_statement: Large documentation projects require coordination across multiple writers. This skill breaks documents into sections, delegates to specialized doc agents, and ensures consistency through structured review workflows.
actual_capabilities: Break large documents into sections with clear scope definitions
Create VibeKanban tasks for each section with required context
Spawn doc writer agents for parallel content creation
Monitor progress and status across all document sections
Review completed sections against defined acceptance criteria
Ensure cross-section consistency through automated checks
limitations: Does not write content directly - only coordinates
Requires VibeKanban MCP tools for task management
Relies on separate doc-coauthoring skill for content creation
Does not generate diagrams - writers must create their own

use_cases.title: Architectural Design Documents
use_cases.description: Coordinate comprehensive design docs across team members with consistent structure and terminology

use_cases.title: API Reference Guides
use_cases.description: Split large API docs into logical sections and delegate to specialized writers for parallel delivery

use_cases.title: Multi-Phase Specifications
use_cases.description: Orchestrate complex spec documents with cascading subsections and hierarchical task delegation

prompt_templates.title: Start Design Doc
prompt_templates.prompt: Coordinate creating a design document for my project. First explore the codebase to understand the structure, then create an outline with all major sections.

prompt_templates.title: Delegate Sections
prompt_templates.prompt: Create VibeKanban tasks for each section of the document. Use the document-skills:doc-coauthoring skill for each task. Delegate all sections to doc writers.

prompt_templates.title: Check Progress
prompt_templates.prompt: Check the status of all document writing tasks. Show me which sections are done, in review, in progress, and still pending.

prompt_templates.title: Consistency Review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review all completed sections for consistency. Check terminology, cross-references, and ensure the document flows logically. Flag any issues.

output_examples.input: Create a design document for my blockchain benchmarking project. Break it into sections and delegate to writers.

best_practices: Explore the codebase thoroughly before creating the outline to ensure all components are captured
Provide sufficient context in each task so writers understand the project scope
Set word limits for sections to trigger cascading delegation for large topics
Run consistency checks after each section is merged to maintain document coherence
anti_patterns: Writing content directly instead of delegating to specialized doc writer agents
Creating tasks without enough context for fresh agents to understand the project
Skipping the consistency review phase and allowing terminology drift
Not updating task statuses in VibeKanban, losing track of document progress

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It requires VibeKanban MCP tools for task management.

faq.question: What is the maximum document size?
faq.answer: Documents scale through recursive delegation. Set word limits per section and create subsections for complex topics.

faq.question: How do I integrate with VibeKanban?
faq.answer: Configure the VibeKanban MCP plugin. Get your project UUID from list_projects and repo IDs from list_repos.

faq.question: Is my document data stored externally?
faq.answer: No. This skill uses local MCP tools. Document content lives in your project repository only.

faq.question: Why are sections not being written?
faq.answer: Verify that document-skills:doc-coauthoring is available and that tasks include the required skill invocation.

faq.question: How is this different from regular document writing?
faq.answer: Unlike direct writing, this skill orchestrates multiple agents for parallel production. The coordinator never writes - only plans and reviews.
